name: Time Survivors: Prologue
description:
This is the free prologue to Time Survivors, a rogue-like bullet hell game where you can play as legendary historical characters such as Lincoln, Tesla, Cleopatra, and Nero. Burn your enemies as Nero, electrocute vicious dinosaurs as Tesla, or restore justice as Lincoln!



Travel through time and fight hordes of memorable enemies as you unravel a mystery. With over 150 different weapons, items, Relics, and buffs to choose from, every run is a unique experience. Fight skeletons in the Medieval Age, Velociraptors and T-Rexes in the Stone Age, and discover plenty of quests and secrets along the way.


  • 2 stages full of enemies, secrets, mini bosses and end-stage boss: The Dark Age and the Stone Age
  • 6 unlockable characters from the entire human history!
  • 27 different weapons and buffs to choose from for a unique experience every run
  • 8 Cursed Relics
  • 41 different enemies
  • 29 Unlockables


  • 9 stages full of enemies, secrets, mini bosses and end-stage boss
  • 20 unlockable epic characters from the entire human history!
  • 40+ different weapons and buffs to choose from for a unique experience every run
  • 20+ Cursed Relics
  • 107 different enemies
  • 80+ Unlockables

What you always get:

  • Play as epic historic characters, such as Lincoln, Tesla, Cleopatra and more!
  • Casual quick 20 minute play sessions + plenty of quests and secrets to discover
  • The Sandbox mode to test any overpowered build and train against any enemy

And since you've come this far... don't forget to wishlist the full gameto stay up-to-date on the latest features and updates!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2211390/Time_Survivors/
